module.description: Call Data Record report tools for viewing reports of your calls
module.name: CDR Reports
module.changelog: *12.0.22* Invalid port declaration *12.0.21* Add index to DID col in cdr DB *12.0.20* CDR module shouldnt use hard coded asteriskcdrdb as a definition for odbc *12.0.19* Language fixes *12.0.18* Fix colors in UCP *12.0.17* FREEPBX-8845 SQL Injection Vulnerability *12.0.16* FREEPBX-8103 FREEPBX-8294 Ability to hide recorded call files on the User Control Panel *12.0.15* FREEPBX-8197 Show the download link in small screen devices *12.0.14* FREEPBX-8325 Seperate Call History/Recordings in the UCP from settings *12.0.13* Better media handling for in browser playback in UCP, added error reporting as well *12.0.12* FREEPBX-7518 *12.0.11* Contact Manager Support in UCP *12.0.10* FREEPBX-8257 UCP Not playing back Call recordings or Download attempts forward to blank page and no file *12.0.9* Updates to CDR display in UCP *12.0.8* FREEPBX-8226 Names dont show up on virtual extensions in UCP *12.0.7* Dont support range on a download, cleanup so that cdr and this look similar *12.0.6* Fixes to allow playback in Safari and Mobile devices (yes including apple and android) *12.0.5* Fixes issue with exporting CSV records with quotes *12.0.4* FREEPBX-8081, FREEPBX-7696 enable CEL logging in advanced settings does not enable CEL *12.0.3* Small fix for CDRs in UCP *12.0.2* FREEPBX-7996 call history in UCP not capturing all calls, check cnum as well as others *12.0.1alpha8* Remove old 2.9 color schemes *12.0.1alpha7* Undefined Variables cleanup *12.0.1alpha6* Database connection fixes *12.0.1alpha5* Database connection fixes *12.0.1alpha4* Database connection fixes *12.0.1alpha3* More UCP work *12.0.1alpha2* Added UCP module *12.0.1alpha1* HTML5 Playback Support *2.11.0.11* #7338 *2.11.0.10* generate license file *2.11.0.8* #6798 - fix query which returned incorrect results *2.11.0.7* #6798 *2.11.0.6* Database Abstraction Layer Fixes *2.11.0.5* #6123 *2.11.0.4* #6545, #6540, #6736 *2.11.0.3* #6603 *2.11.0.2* #6391 *2.11.0.1* #6255 *2.11.0.0* finish #5782 generate cel and res_odbc conf files, requires odbc.ini to be configured *2.11.0.beta1.2* #6134 again *2.11.0.beta1.1* #6134 *2.11.0.beta1.0* adds proper cid fields *2.11.0.alpha2* #5788, #5782 more *2.11.0.alpha1* #5782 Adds some CEL support ODBC and CEL manual setup required see cel.man.zip *2.10.0.4* formatting tweaks *2.10.0.3* #5500 *2.10.0.2* #5478, $5479 *2.10.0.1* add call recordings to CDR *2.10.0.0* #1426 *2.10.0.beta4* Bug fixes, re-categorizations *2.10.0.beta3* Speed up download of csv *2.10.0.beta2* Bug fixes *2.10.0.beta1* Play recorded files *2.10.0.alpha6* Bug fix in recordings settings *2.10.0.alpha5* Added localization *2.10.0.alpha4* Added csv export *2.10.0.alpha3* First public release *2.10.0.alpha2* Not released to public *2.10.0.alpha1* Not released to public *2.10.0.alpha0* Not released to public
